instructions:
Study Context: Same rules as Experiment 1, but participants were informed the division was hypothetical and they would only receive the $3 participation fee.

Decision Task Details:
After the proposal forms have been returned to Room A each person will be paid. The experimenter will pay you the $3 for your participation in this experiment.

items.question: You are Player 1. You must decide how to divide a $5 pie between yourself and Player 2. Please specify the amount (in dollars) that Player 2 is to receive. (Player 1 will receive the remainder: $5 minus the amount given to Player 2).
